name: Pendylum Mini Golf
description:
Enjoy all the fun of mini-golf on the go with Pendylum Mini-Golf! Guide your ball through tunnels, over bridges, and through chicanes as you attempt to become a mini-golf master! Avoid the water hazards and deadly gaps in the wall as you navigate around the obstacles and try to beat the course record. Play the front nine, back nine, or all 18 holes on three different courses, and aim for mini-golf greatness!

GAMEPLAY
Use the on-screen buttons to rotate the camera and zoom in and out. Use the arrow buttons to aim your shot, or tap the target button to aim directly for the hole. Tap the shoot button to start your shot, and when the power bar reaches the optimum spot, tap shoot again to make your putt. Watch the power bar carefully and try to putt with the proper amount of force. Finish each hole under par to increase your score, and try to line up the perfect shot for a hole in one!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Three courses to test your skills!
* Over 50 different holes to try!
* Countless features and obstacles!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* Cute and bouncy soundtrack!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
